comment._content: I wonder if this is the billiards champion?

comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: I started an entry for him in Wikipedia: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fred_Eames

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: Logista and Richard Arthur Norton:  Thanks for your research on this photo.  It seems like this could be Fred Eames the billiard champion.  We will add the information to the record, saying that it "possibly" is Fred Eames the billiard player, until we can find a photo from another source confirming it.
